description: The AmazonBasics Universal Case for Small Electronics offers a simple and affordable way to store and protect your camera, cell phone, GPS unit, or other small electronic device. This versatile case features foam padding to protect your gadget, as well as a drawstring closure for security and a carabiner for easy carrying.
title: AmazonBasics Quilted Case for Small Electronics Including Cameras, Mobile Phones, and GPS Units (Black)
